function:
It measures the awareness of
narrative identity and how globally coherent one’s autobiographical memories are perceived to be
It measures awareness of life stories about the self and the perception of globally coherent personal memories

It measures the ability to accurately perceive the order in which
experiences have occurred over the lifetime to date.

It measures the perception that experiences are
meaningfully associated and that events have causal connections with self-identity.

It measuresthe ability to draw out similarities
between episodes in life, and identify overarching themes
that act as integrated interpretations of these events or circumstances
It measures general emotion
It measures general tendencies toward feeling contentment and joy
It  measures tendencies toward feeling, sad, anxious, and angry
It measures eudaimonic well-being(psychological well-being)

It measures the individual’s ability to function free from the influence and control of others, to regulate emotions
and behavior from within

It measures s a person’s capacity to
design environments appropriate for their own propensities, the ability to “manipulate and control complex environments”

It measures the capacity to realize our potentials, to perceive life as a process of continuous
change, challenges, and opportunities, through which we
continuously grow
It measures  the capacity to develop and maintain warm, affectionate, and trusting human relationships
It measures the capacity to determine and (re)construct meaning in life.
It measures acceptance of one’s internal states (i.e., thoughts and emotions)
It measures individual differences in private self-consciousness
It measures the inspection and evaluation of one’s thoughts, feelings, and behavior
It measures the the clarity of understanding of one’s thoughts, feelings, and behavior
It measures global life satisfaction
A multidimensional measure of well-being
